data.name: Nevrosa: Prelude
data.detailed_description:
Support the Development



We prepared three awesome DLCs with different bonuses to the owners.
If you want to say "Thank you" or "Great job!" — here is the best way to do it:

  • Support DLC will keep Nevrosa: Prelude in your library even if you delete the game files.
  • Wallpaper DLC includes beautiful images from Nevrosa world for your desktop. Plan to update it regularly.
  • 3D Print Collectable DLC includes Support DLC, one Wallpaper set, and files to create a unique artifact from Nevrosa world — the Cube.
We are happy that you like Nevrosa: Prelude; your feedback and videos — that gives us great motivation while making an interesting and unique experience for you.

Thank you all again.

GexagonVR team.


No teleport or other tricks

你好！这个游戏只有一个位移方式 — 你自己的脚。

你们需要至少1.5x2米玩的区域。

重定向行走就是我们把场所或你的真实世界的路径适应当前游戏情况。

这个增加全新的沉浸级别，让你更深入地进入游戏过程。 你试一试！

请留下您的反馈！ 这对我们非常重要！


关于游戏

你在一个奇怪的地方醒来 — 这是一个梦想还是现实？ 你需要做什么？你一个人吗？

你试Nevrosa世界，世界为VR游戏带来新的游戏机制：

  • 重定向行走 — 我们不使用瞬移或任何其他运动系统。
  • 你只需要双手和一个按钮拿东西— 按下控制器上的触发器进行交互。
  • 啊！你可以死。一定会死。


新颖的难题，黑暗的气氛和惊心动魄的生物帮助你对于逃脱恐怖的经验有思想准备。

在Nevrosa还有一些东西：前奏曲

  • 装饰艺术的环境，很可怕的拼图机等着你。
  • 生存恐怖元：奇怪的生物藏在这个房间里。。。如果你们见面，你会发生什么？
  • 你拿着邪恶的神器：为什么它跟随你？它耳语还是头嗡嗡响？
  • 黑暗的音轨和位置音响系统。
  • 不同的结局：你决定如何结束这个噩梦！

data.short_description: You wake up in a strange, but yet familiar place. You feel like you are supposed to be here for something.VR roomscale puzzle-horror game with redirect walking locomotion.

英语*, 简体中文*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
data.reviews:
“A free introduction to a world the developers want to build. Give it a shot.”
UploadVR

“Probably the best aspect of this game for me, by far, was the lack of jump scares (.....) the guys over at Gexagon really know how to draw you into the horror without resorting to cheap tricks and gore.”
VR the Gamers

“While not as horrifically frightening [...] Nevrosa does a brilliant job of immersing the player in the game environment and between scratching your head over the clever puzzles, you will be quickly turning to see what’s shuffling around in the dark, just over there…”
TOP 10 BEST HALLOWEEN VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统 *: Windows 7+
  • 处理器: Intel i5 or similar
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 显卡: NVidia GTX 770 2Gb or similar
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
  • 支持 VR: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
  • 附注事项: HTC Vive or Oculus Touch required!
